Reviews.Content: Once I got it in tact is is fantastic great picture a Ok thanks for the re ship for the one thAt came in damagec

ProductInfo.Features:
Premium Edge Lit LED lines your screen's interior perimeter with dazzling LED backlighting, so you can enjoy first-rate color and brilliance packed into an amazing, ultra-thin profile.
SRS StudioSound HD delivers immersive surround sound, deep bass, clear dialog and level volume.
Ambient light-sensing technology automatically adjusts your screen brightness for the best picture in any room.
ProductInfo.Name: Vizio RBE240AR Refurbished 24-Inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black)
